[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/webpack4-localization-plugin](./webpack4-localization-plugin.md) &gt; [ILocalizationPluginOptions](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ilocalizationpluginoptions.md) &gt; [ignoreString](./webpack4-localization-plugin.ilocalizationpluginoptions.ignorestring.md)

## ILocalizationPluginOptions.ignoreString property

Optionally, provide a function that will be called for each string. If the function returns `true` the string will not be included.

**Signature:**

```typescript
ignoreString?: IgnoreStringFunction;
```
